verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came again to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3213><s%> Wail, <S%H3213><s%> Alas for <S%H1929><s%> the day! <S%H3117><s%>

For the day <S%H3117><s%> is near, <S%H7138><s%> even the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is near; <S%H7138><s%> it shall be a day <S%H3117><s%> of clouds, <S%H6051><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

A sword <S%H2719><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and anguish <S%H2479><s%> shall be in Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> when the slain <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and they shall take away <S%H3947><s%> her multitude, <S%H1995><s%> and her foundations <S%H3247><s%> shall be broken down. <S%H2040><s%>

Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> and Put, <S%H6316><s%> and Lud, <S%H3865><s%> and all the mixed <S%H6153><s%> people, <S%H1121><s%> and Cub, <S%H1121><s%> and the children of the land <S%H776><s%> that is allied <S%H1285><s%> with them, <S%H5307><s%> shall fall with them by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> They also who uphold <S%H5564><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall fall; <S%H5307><s%> and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> shall come down: <S%H3381><s%> from the tower <S%H4024><s%> of Seveneh <S%H5482><s%> shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> in it by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

They shall be desolate <S%H8074><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%> that are desolate; <S%H8074><s%> and her cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are wasted. <S%H2717><s%>
They shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I have set <S%H5414><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and all her helpers <S%H5826><s%> are destroyed. <S%H7665><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall messengers <S%H4397><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> from before me <S%H6440><s%> in ships <S%H6716><s%> to make the careless <S%H983><s%> Ethiopians <S%H3568><s%> afraid; <S%H2729><s%> and there shall be anguish <S%H2479><s%> on them, <S%H3117><s%> as in the day of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for, <S%H935><s%> behold, it comes.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> I will also make the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to cease, <S%H7673><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

He and his people <S%H5971><s%> with him, <S%H6184><s%> the terrible of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> shall be brought <S%H935><s%> in to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> and they shall draw <S%H7324><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> against Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with the slain. <S%H2491><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> the rivers <S%H2975><s%> dry, <S%H2724><s%> and will sell <S%H4376><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> men; <S%H776><s%> and I will make the land desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and all that is therein, <S%H4393><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of strangers: <S%H2114><s%> I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have spoken it. <S%H1696><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> I will also destroy <S%H6><s%> the idols, <S%H1544><s%> and I will cause the images <S%H457><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> from Memphis; <S%H5297><s%> and there shall be no more a prince <S%H5387><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and I will put <S%H5414><s%> a fear <S%H3374><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

I will make Pathros <S%H6624><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and will set <S%H5414><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Zoan, <S%H6814><s%> and will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on No. <S%H4996><s%>

I will pour <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> on Sin, <S%H5512><s%> the stronghold <S%H4581><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of No. <S%H4996><s%>

I will set <S%H5414><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> Sin <S%H5512><s%> shall be in great <S%H2342><s%> anguish, <S%H2342><s%> and No <S%H4996><s%> shall be broken <S%H1234><s%> up; <S%H5297><s%> and Memphis shall have adversaries <S%H6862><s%> in the daytime. <S%H3119><s%>

The young men <S%H970><s%> of Aven <S%H206><s%> and of Pibeseth <S%H6364><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and these cities shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>

At Tehaphnehes <S%H8471><s%> also the day <S%H3117><s%> shall withdraw <S%H2821><s%> itself, <S%H7665><s%> when I shall break there the yokes <S%H4133><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> shall cease <S%H7673><s%> in her: <S%H1931><s%> as for her, <S%H6051><s%> a cloud shall cover <S%H3680><s%> her, <S%H1323><s%> and her daughters shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>
Thus will I execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

It happened in the eleventh <S%H259><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H7651><s%> in the seventh day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and behold, <S%H2280><s%> it has not been bound up, to apply healing <S%H7499><s%> medicines, <S%H7760><s%> to put a bandage <S%H2848><s%> to bind <S%H2280><s%> it, <S%H2388><s%> that it be strong to hold <S%H8610><s%> the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H6547><s%> I am against Pharaoh king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and will break <S%H7665><s%> his arms, <S%H2220><s%> the strong <S%H2389><s%> arm, <S%H7665><s%> and that which was broken; and I will cause the sword <S%H2719><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> out of his hand. <S%H3027><s%>
I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and will disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries. <S%H776><s%>

I will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> in his hand: <S%H3027><s%> but I will break <S%H7665><s%> the arms <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and he shall groan <S%H5008><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him with the groanings <S%H5009><s%> of a deadly wounded man. <S%H2491><s%>

I will hold <S%H2388><s%> up the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon; <S%H894><s%> and the arms <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall fall down; <S%H5307><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall put <S%H5414><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he shall stretch it out <S%H5186><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries; <S%H776><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
